name: GPT-5 Enhancement Queue for VIP Leads

parameters.query:
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as recent_vip_count,
  AVG(confidence_score) as avg_confidence
FROM leads
WHERE estimated_value >= 750000
  AND created_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days'
  AND recommended_action IS NOT NULL

parameters.bodyParametersJson:
={{ JSON.stringify({
  lead_id: $node['Validate & Enrich VIP Lead'].json.lead_id,
  source: $node['Validate & Enrich VIP Lead'].json.lead_source,
  created_at: $node['Validate & Enrich VIP Lead'].json.created_at,
  last_interaction_at: $node['Validate & Enrich VIP Lead'].json.last_contact,
  property_zip: $node['Validate & Enrich VIP Lead'].json.property_address.split(',').pop().trim(),
  estimated_value: $node['Validate & Enrich VIP Lead'].json.estimated_value,
  interaction_count: $node['Validate & Enrich VIP Lead'].json.total_interactions,
  email_open_rate: $node['Validate & Enrich VIP Lead'].json.email_engagement,
  response_rate: $node['Validate & Enrich VIP Lead'].json.response_rate,
  lead_score: $node['Validate & Enrich VIP Lead'].json.lead_score
}) }}

parameters.columns: recommended_action, confidence_score, priority_level, strategic_reasoning, talking_points, urgency_level, gpt_enhanced, gpt_enhanced_at

parameters.subject: =üåü VIP Lead Strategy - {{$node['Build Strategic Plan'].json.customer_name}} (${{$node['Build Strategic Plan'].json.estimated_value.toLocaleString()}})

parameters.subject: ‚ö†Ô∏è VIP Enhancement Queue Full
parameters.text:
=VIP Enhancement Queue is at capacity.

Current Queue Load: {{$node['Check VIP Queue Load'].json.recent_vip_count}} VIP leads in past 7 days
Capacity Limit: 50 concurrent VIP leads

Action Required:
1. Review and close completed VIP leads
2. Prioritize active VIP opportunities
3. Consider scaling GPT-5 enhancement capacity

Lead Attempted: {{$node['Validate & Enrich VIP Lead'].json.lead_id}}
Property Value: ${{$node['Validate & Enrich VIP Lead'].json.estimated_value.toLocaleString()}}

This lead will be queued for next available slot.
